result.name: sublittoral-nematode-and-copepod-assemblages-from-12-sites-around-the-uk-coast-from-may-19-1999
result.notes:
Data consists of presense data of nematode worms and copepods in the form of 
count data. Sampling was conducted from May 1997 to June 1999 in 12 sampling 
locations, 6 inshore (Burbo Bight, Swansea Bay, Off Plymouth, Off 
Thames, Tees inshore, Tyne inshore) and 6 offshore (Dundrum Bay, 
Cardigan Bay, Celtic Deep, Lyme Bay, Off Humber and Off Tyne) around the coast 
of the UK.

Data including sediment granulometry and trace metal concentrations are also 
available.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Sublittoral nematode and copepod assemblages from 12 sites around the UK coast from May 1997 to November 1999

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
resources.name: Cefas Data Portal
